drinks.name: Adam
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: ACID
drinks.instructions: Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

drinks.name: AT&T
drinks.instructions: Pour Vodka and Gin over ice, add Tonic and Stir

drinks.name: Ace
drinks.instructions: Shake all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker and ice then strain in a cold glass.

drinks.name: ABC
drinks.instructions: Layered in a shot glass.

drinks.name: A1
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.

drinks.name: Affair
drinks.instructions: Pour schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

drinks.name: A. J.
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Apello
drinks.instructions: Stirr. Grnish with maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Abilene
drinks.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Addison
drinks.instructions: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

drinks.name: Aviation
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Acapulco
drinks.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

drinks.name: Affinity
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Applecar
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Almeria
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Afterglow
drinks.instructions: Mix. Serve over ice.

drinks.name: Afternoon
drinks.instructions: Build into a suiting glass, with no ice. Cream on top if wanted. Served directly.

drinks.name: After sex
drinks.instructions: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar

drinks.name: Addington
drinks.instructions: Mix both the vermouth's in a shaker and strain into a cold glass. Top up with a squirt of Soda Water.

drinks.name: Algonquin
drinks.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Casino
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

drinks.name: Allegheny
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Alexander
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Cafe Savoy
drinks.instructions: Fill mug almost to top with coffee.Add milk, triple sec and brandy. Stir.

drinks.name: Cuba Libra
drinks.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Caipirinha
drinks.instructions: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça.

drinks.name: Cream Soda
drinks.instructions: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

drinks.name: Cuba Libre
drinks.instructions: Build all ingredients in a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Corn n Oil
drinks.instructions: Cut the half lime in half again. Add the lime, falernum, and bitters to a rocks glass. Muddle. Add the rum. (Aged Barbados rum such as Plantation 5 Year is recommended). Add ice and stir. Float the blackstrap rum on top. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Citrus Coke
drinks.instructions: Pour half of coke in a glass. Then add Bacardi and top it off with the remaining coke. Stir and drink up!

drinks.name: Cherry Rum
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Caipirissima
drinks.instructions: Same as Caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add WHITE RUM. It's great!!!!!!!!

drinks.name: Casa Blanca
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Clover Club
drinks.instructions: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

drinks.name: City Slicker
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Campari Beer
drinks.instructions: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.

drinks.name: Casino Royale
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

drinks.name: Chicago Fizz
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Clove Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Coke and Drops
drinks.instructions: Take a glass, pour the Coke in the glass, then you take 7 drops of lemon juice. Granish with a lemon slice on the rim of the glass.

drinks.name: Corpse Reviver
drinks.instructions: Shake, strain, straight up, cocktail glass rinsed with absinthe

drinks.name: Coffee Liqueur
drinks.instructions: Combine coffee, sugar and water. Simmer 1 hour and let cool. Add vanilla and vodka. Age in sealed jar 2 to 3 weeks.

drinks.name: Chocolate Milk
drinks.instructions: Put the milk in the bottom, pour the Liquer on top and add the dash of amaretto. Do not mix. SLAM IT!

drinks.name: Cranberry Punch
drinks.instructions: Combine first four ingredients. Stir until sugar is dissolved, chill. Then add ginger ale just before serving. Add ice ring to keep punch cold.

drinks.name: Derby
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.

drinks.name: Diesel
drinks.instructions: Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial. Top up with the cider. The colour sholud be very dark approaching the colour of Guiness.

drinks.name: Chocolate Drink
drinks.instructions: Melt the bar in a small amount of boiling water. Add milk. Cook over low heat, whipping gently (with a whisk, i would assume) until heated well. Don't let it boil! Serve in coffee mug.

drinks.name: Danbooka
drinks.instructions: pour it in and mix it.

drinks.name: Daiquiri
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Downshift
drinks.instructions: Start with the Sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid Fruit Punch, then float the 151. Rocks optional.

drinks.name: Dry Martini
drinks.instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

drinks.name: Dragonfly
drinks.instructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and ginger ale. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

drinks.name: Dry Rob Roy
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Dark and Stormy
drinks.instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl dark rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Dirty Nipple
drinks.instructions: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top

drinks.name: Dark Caipirinha
drinks.instructions:
Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cachaca into the glass.
Stir well.

drinks.name: Duchamp's Punch
drinks.instructions:
Shake all ingredients.
Double strain in a chilled double old fashioned glass with abig ice cube.
Garnish with a couple of lavender sprigs

drinks.name: Dubonnet Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Damned if you do
drinks.instructions: Pour into shot glass. Put in mouth. Repeat as deemed necessary.

drinks.name: Death in the Afternoon
drinks.instructions: Easy as you like, pour the absinthe into a chilled glass, top with champagne. Must be drunk mid afternoon for the optimum effect.

drinks.name: French 75
drinks.instructions: Combine gin, sugar, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Foxy Lady
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Fruit Shake
drinks.instructions: Blend til smooth.

drinks.name: Freddy Kruger
drinks.instructions: make it an ample size shot!!

drinks.name: Funk and Soul
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients together and strain into a Collins glass. Use Jamaican rum where possible for a more authentic taste.

drinks.name: Frisco Sour
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

drinks.name: French Negroni
drinks.instructions:
Add ice to a shaker and pour in all ingredients.
Using a bar spoon, stir 40 to 45 revolutions or until thoroughly chilled.
Strain into a martini glass or over ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with orange twist.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Asshole
drinks.instructions: fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.

drinks.name: French Martini
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

drinks.name: Fahrenheit 5000
drinks.instructions: Cover bottom of shot glass with Tabasco Sauce and then fill with half Firewater and half Absolut Peppar.

drinks.name: Flying Dutchman
drinks.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

drinks.name: Fruit Flip-Flop
drinks.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Flying Scotchman
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Frozen Daiquiri
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

drinks.name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

drinks.name: French Connection
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Flander's Flake-Out
drinks.instructions: Bang 'em both in.

drinks.name: Flaming Dr. Pepper
drinks.instructions: Add Amaretto, Bacardi, and vodka. Mix in the Dr. Pepper and beer

drinks.name: Bijou
drinks.instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain

drinks.name: Big Red
drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass

drinks.name: Boxcar
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: B-53
drinks.instructions: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52

drinks.name: B-52
drinks.instructions: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

drinks.name: Balmoral
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bramble
drinks.instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

drinks.name: Brooklyn
drinks.instructions: Combine ingredients with ice and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bora Bora
drinks.instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

drinks.name: Bluebird
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

drinks.name: Bellini
drinks.instructions: Pour peach purée into chilled flute, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Broadside
drinks.instructions: Half fill the glass with ice cubes. Crush the wormwood and add to ice. Pour rum, scotch and butters, then serve!

drinks.name: Buccaneer
drinks.instructions: Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently

drinks.name: Brigadier
drinks.instructions: Mix ingredients in a warmed mug and stir.

drinks.name: Boomerang
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: Barracuda
drinks.instructions: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine.

drinks.name: Brain Fart
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.

drinks.name: Blackthorn
drinks.instructions: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Bob Marley
drinks.instructions: Layer in a 2 oz shot glass or pony glass

drinks.name: Bible Belt
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.

drinks.name: Baby Eskimo
drinks.instructions: Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes. Add ingredients in order, stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too). Consume immediately and often. Nice and light, great for following a heavy drink.

drinks.name: Bubble Gum
drinks.instructions: Layer in order into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Bahama Mama
drinks.instructions:
Add 2 parts club soda or more or less to taste.

Mix it all together and pour over a bunch of ice. Drink with a straw.

drinks.name: English Highball
drinks.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinks.name: Egg Cream
drinks.instructions: Mix syrup and milk in a fountain glass. Add soda water, serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Boston Sour
drinks.instructions: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Espresso Martini
drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass

drinks.name: Espresso Rumtini
drinks.instructions: Mix together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with some choclate powder and coffee beans

drinks.name: English Rose Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Elderflower Caipirinha
drinks.instructions: Take the glass and muddle the lime in it. Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the Cachaca. Stir well and top with some more crushed ice. Garnish with lime and enjoy!

drinks.name: Egg Nog - Healthy
drinks.instructions: Whip egg substitute and sugar together, combine with the two kinds of milk, vanilla, and rum. Mix well. Chill over night. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Makes 6 servings.

drinks.name: GG
drinks.instructions: Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.

drinks.name: Gagliardo
drinks.instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

drinks.name: Godmother
drinks.instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

drinks.name: Gimlet
drinks.instructions:
Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass or an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice.

Garnish with a lime wheel.

drinks.name: Gin Sour
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinks.name: Gin Fizz
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.

drinks.name: Godchild
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Toddy
drinks.instructions: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Daisy
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

drinks.name: Gin Tonic
drinks.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, pour the gin, top with tonic water and squeeze a lemon wedge and garnish with a lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Godfather
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Gin Rickey
drinks.instructions: Half-fill a tall glass with ice. Mix the gin and Grenadine together and pour over the ice. Add the lime or lemon juice and top off with soda water. Decorate the glass with lime and/or lemon slices.

drinks.name: Greyhound
drinks.instructions:
Add the vodka to a Collins glass filled with ice.
Top with grapefruit juice and stir.

drinks.name: Gin Smash
drinks.instructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Sling
drinks.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Squirt
drinks.instructions: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

drinks.name: Grand Blue
drinks.instructions: Serve in an old fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Gin Cooler
drinks.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

drinks.name: Gin Swizzle
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a colling glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

drinks.name: Grasshopper
drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Grass Skirt
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

drinks.name: Gin and Soda
drinks.instructions:
Pour the Gin and Soda water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes.
Stir well.
Garnish with the lime wedge.

drinks.name: Grim Reaper
drinks.instructions: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.

drinks.name: Kir
drinks.instructions: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

drinks.name: Kamikaze
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Kurant Tea
drinks.instructions: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Karsk
drinks.instructions: Put a copper coin in a coffe-cup and fill up with coffee until you no longer see the coin, then add alcohol until you see the coin. Norwegian speciality.

drinks.name: Kiwi Lemon
drinks.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.

drinks.name: Kioki Coffee
drinks.instructions: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.

drinks.name: Kiss me Quick
drinks.instructions: mix in the glass

drinks.name: Kir Royale
drinks.instructions: Pour Creme de cassis in glass, gently pour champagne on top

drinks.name: Kentucky Colonel
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the courbon and Benedictine. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Kentucky B And B
drinks.instructions: Pour the bourbon and Benedictine into a brandy snifter.

drinks.name: Kool First Aid
drinks.instructions: Add Kool Aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.

drinks.name: Kool-Aid Shot
drinks.instructions: Pour into a large glass with ice and stir. Add a little cranberry juice to taste.

drinks.name: Kiwi Papaya Smoothie
drinks.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinks.name: Kill the cold Smoothie
drinks.instructions: Juice ginger and lemon and add it to hot water. You may add cardomom.

drinks.name: Iced Coffee
drinks.instructions: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink. Serve in coffee mug.

drinks.name: Ice Pick
drinks.instructions: Put Vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

drinks.name: Irish Cream
drinks.instructions: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add rest.

drinks.name: Irish Coffee
drinks.instructions: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.

drinks.name: Imperial Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Irish Russian
drinks.instructions: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the Guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do Not add ice.

drinks.name: Irish Spring
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.

drinks.name: Imperial Fizz
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Irish Curdling Cow
drinks.instructions: Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.

drinks.name: Iced Coffee Fillip
drinks.instructions: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.

drinks.name: Jam Donut
drinks.instructions: Coat the rim of a shot glass with sugar using sugar syrup to stick. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur to the shot glass, and carefully layer the Baileys Irish Cream on top. Serve.

drinks.name: Jitterbug
drinks.instructions: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!

drinks.name: Jelly Bean
drinks.instructions: mix equal parts in pony glass-tastes just like a jelly bean!

drinks.name: Jackhammer
drinks.instructions: Serve over ice- Warning,Deadly!

drinks.name: Jello shots
drinks.instructions: Boil 3 cups of water then add jello. Mix jello and water until jello is completely disolved. Add the two cups of vodka and mix together. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill until firm. Then, eat away...

drinks.name: John Collins
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

drinks.name: Jamaica Kiss
drinks.instructions: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of Tia Maria and a shot of Jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

drinks.name: Just a Moonmint
drinks.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Jamaican Coffee
drinks.instructions: Stir the rum, coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.

drinks.name: Japanese Fizz
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Jewel Of The Nile
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Jack's Vanilla Coke
drinks.instructions: After pouring in your ingredients, and adding 3-5 ice cubes, according to taste. Stir the drink with a stirrer to get the Vanilla off the bottom.

drinks.name: Jack Rose Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: H.D.
drinks.instructions: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.

drinks.name: Honey Bee
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice

drinks.name: Herbal flame
drinks.instructions: Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

drinks.name: Happy Skipper
drinks.instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over ice, fill glass to top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with lime. Tastes like a cream soda. Named for the Gilligan's Island reference ("The Captain" *in* "Ginger" is a Happy Skipper!)

drinks.name: Horse's Neck
drinks.instructions: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

drinks.name: Hunter's Moon
drinks.instructions: Put the Bombay Sapphire, Martini Bianco, sugar syrup & blackberries in a cocktail shaker with lots of ice and shake vigorously before pouring into a balloon glass, topping up with lemonade and garnishing with a wedge of orange.

drinks.name: Havana Cocktail
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Harvey Wallbanger
drinks.instructions: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Hot Creamy Bush
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass

drinks.name: Hot Chocolate to Die for
drinks.instructions: Melt the chocolate, butter and vanilla in a double boiler. When just smooth stir in the cream.

drinks.name: Scooter
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Smut
drinks.instructions: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

drinks.name: Hemingway Special
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.

drinks.name: Spritz
drinks.instructions: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Highland Fling Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

drinks.name: Stinger
drinks.instructions: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

drinks.name: Sangria
drinks.instructions: Mix all together in a pitcher and refrigerate. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste. Serve in wine glasses.

drinks.name: Sidecar
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Snowball
drinks.instructions: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

drinks.name: Snowday
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice. Express orange peel over drink and garnish.

drinks.name: Sea breeze
drinks.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Salty Dog
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

drinks.name: Shot-gun
drinks.instructions: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

drinks.name: Stone Sour
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Screwdriver
drinks.instructions: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Scotch Sour
drinks.instructions: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Shark Attack
drinks.instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

drinks.name: Sweet Tooth
drinks.instructions: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

drinks.name: Sol Y Sombra
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

drinks.name: San Francisco
drinks.instructions: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

drinks.name: Space Odyssey
drinks.instructions: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

drinks.name: Sherry Flip
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Sweet Bananas
drinks.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Sherry Eggnog
drinks.instructions: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Sweet Sangria
drinks.instructions: Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool. Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours. Serve in tall glasses with a straw.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.

drinks.name: Mimosa
drinks.instructions: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

drinks.name: Manhattan
drinks.instructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

drinks.name: Mai Tai
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

drinks.name: Martini
drinks.instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

drinks.name: Michelada
drinks.instructions:
Mix the beer with tomato juice, freshly squeezed lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, or hot sauce.
Served In a chilled, salt-rimmed glass

drinks.name: Mint Julep
drinks.instructions: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.

drinks.name: Moranguito
drinks.instructions: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

drinks.name: Mudslinger
drinks.instructions: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

drinks.name: Martinez 2
drinks.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice.

Stir until chilled, and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

drinks.name: Miami Vice
drinks.instructions: First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).

drinks.name: Moscow Mule
drinks.instructions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

drinks.name: Mocha-Berry
drinks.instructions: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Mulled Wine
drinks.instructions: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy.

drinks.name: Masala Chai
drinks.instructions: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.

drinks.name: Munich Mule
drinks.instructions:
Fill glass with ice
Pour Gin and Lime Juice
Fill glass with Ginger Beer
Garnish with Cucumer and Lime slice

drinks.name: Mojito Extra
drinks.instructions: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.

drinks.name: Monkey Gland
drinks.instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Monkey Wrench
drinks.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Midnight Mint
drinks.instructions: If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Mother's Milk
drinks.instructions: Shake over ice, strain. Serves two.

drinks.name: Lunch Box
drinks.instructions: Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.

drinks.name: Limeade
drinks.instructions: In a large glass, put the lime juice and sugar, and stir well. Add cold seltzer water to fill. Put the lime peels in the glass. Drink. Repeat until limes or soda run out.

drinks.name: Lemon Drop
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

drinks.name: Mary Pickford
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

drinks.name: Lassi Khara
drinks.instructions: Blend (frappe) in blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

drinks.name: Loch Lomond
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Long vodka
drinks.instructions: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka

drinks.name: London Town
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Lassi - Mango
drinks.instructions: Put it all in a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

drinks.name: Lassi - Sweet
drinks.instructions: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

drinks.name: Lady Love Fizz
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Lord And Lady
drinks.instructions: Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Lone Tree Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea
drinks.instructions: Mix all contents in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add dash of Coca-Cola for the coloring and garnish with lemon or lime twist.

drinks.name: Lone Tree Cooler
drinks.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

drinks.name: Long Island Tea
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: Lazy Coconut Paloma
drinks.instructions: Mix the coconut liqueur (preferably tequila) with the grapefruit juice and top with soda water. Garnish with a large grapefruit slice against the inside of the glass.

drinks.name: Lemon Elderflower Spritzer
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice, stir and enjoy!

drinks.name: Whisky Mac
drinks.instructions: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

drinks.name: Yellow Bird
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

drinks.name: Wine Punch
drinks.instructions: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice.

drinks.name: White Lady
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Winter Rita
drinks.instructions: Salt rim. Combine all ingredients, shake with ice, and strain over fresh ice.⠀

drinks.name: Wine Cooler
drinks.instructions: Mix wine and soft drink. Pour into glass. Add ice.

drinks.name: White Russian
drinks.instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
drinks.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

drinks.name: Waikiki Beachcomber
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Whitecap Margarita
drinks.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.

drinks.name: White Wine Sangria
drinks.instructions: Chop the Lemon, Lime and other fruits into large chunks. Fill the Pitcher with the white wine and mix in the Apple Brandy. Top to taste with soda water.

drinks.name: Zinger
drinks.instructions: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.

drinks.name: Zorro
drinks.instructions: add all and pour black coffee and add whipped cream on top.

drinks.name: Zoksel
drinks.instructions: No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.

drinks.name: Zambeer
drinks.instructions: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice

drinks.name: Zorbatini
drinks.instructions: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.

drinks.name: Zima Blaster
drinks.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.

drinks.name: Zipperhead
drinks.instructions: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).

drinks.name: Zenmeister
drinks.instructions: Mix together and enjoy

drinks.name: Zizi Coin-coin
drinks.instructions: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.

drinks.name: Zippy's Revenge
drinks.instructions: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto. shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid... serve cold

drinks.name: Zimadori Zinger
drinks.instructions: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori. Don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: New York Sour
drinks.instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret on top. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon and the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Nutty Irishman
drinks.instructions: Serve over ice

drinks.name: National Aquarium
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
drinks.instructions: Serve without ice. At least the juice shold have room temperature.

drinks.name: Nuked Hot Chocolate
drinks.instructions: Mix with a bit of milk (1 oz or so) in coffee mug. Nuke mug for about 30-50 seconds. Stir until the heated cocoa dissolves. Fill mug with milk. Nuke for 1-2 minutes, depending on wattage and preferences as to burnt mouth parts.

drinks.name: Rose
drinks.instructions: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Radler
drinks.instructions: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).

drinks.name: New York Lemonade
drinks.instructions: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.

drinks.name: Rum Toddy
drinks.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Sour
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinks.name: Royal Fizz
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Punch
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Cooler
drinks.instructions: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Rum Cobbler
drinks.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

drinks.name: Rum Runner
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

drinks.name: Royal Bitch
drinks.instructions: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.

drinks.name: Red Snapper
drinks.instructions: One shot each, shake n shoot

drinks.name: Royal Flush
drinks.instructions: Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice. Strain into glass.

drinks.name: Rusty Nail
drinks.instructions: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Rail Splitter
drinks.instructions: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Rum Milk Punch
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Royal Gin Fizz
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Ruby Tuesday
drinks.instructions: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

drinks.name: Rosemary Blue
drinks.instructions:
1) Add the Bombay Sapphire, Blue Curacao, rosemary sprig and gently squeezed lemon wedge to a balloon glass. Swirl well to combine.
2) Fill with cubed ice and top with the Fever-Tree Light Tonic Water.
3) Gently fold with a bar spoon to mix.

drinks.name: Rum Old-fashioned
drinks.instructions: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

drinks.name: Raspberry Cooler
drinks.instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Raspberry Julep
drinks.instructions: Softly muddle the mint leaves and raspberry syrup in the bottom of the cup. Add crushed ice and Bourbon to the cup and then stir. Top with more ice, garnish with a mint sprig.

drinks.name: Rum Screwdriver
drinks.instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Russian Spring Punch
drinks.instructions: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine.

drinks.name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.

drinks.name: Pink Lady
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Pegu Club
drinks.instructions: Shake, strain, up, cocktail glass

drinks.name: Paloma
drinks.instructions: Stir together and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Paradise
drinks.instructions: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

drinks.name: Pink Gin
drinks.instructions: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

drinks.name: Pink Moon
drinks.instructions: Slowly shake in a shaker with ice, strain into a square whiskey glass. Top with fresh ice. Add the blackberries to garnish. Add flowers and a green leaf for a special look!

drinks.name: Pisco Sour
drinks.instructions: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.

drinks.name: Pink Penocha
drinks.instructions: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

drinks.name: Porto flip
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Pina Colada
drinks.instructions: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Penicillin
drinks.instructions: Shake blended Scotch, lemon juice, honey syrup and ginger syrup with ice. Strain over large ice in chilled rocks glass. Float smoky Scotch on top (be sure to use a smoky Scotch such as an Islay single malt). Garnish with candied ginger.

drinks.name: Port Wine Flip
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Popped cherry
drinks.instructions: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

drinks.name: Pure Passion
drinks.instructions: Mix up all ingredients with a cocktail stirrer and serve with crushed ice with mint and edible flour if available.

drinks.name: Planter's Punch
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

drinks.name: Poppy Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Pineapple Paloma
drinks.instructions:
Rub the rim of each glass with lime slice and dip into salt.
Add ice, tequila, grapefruit juice, lime juice and top with pineapple soda.
Give it a quick stir.
Garnish with fresh pineapple or lime.

drinks.name: Port And Starboard
drinks.instructions: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

drinks.name: Pornstar Martini
drinks.instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Cut passion fruit in half and use as garnish. Pour prosecco into a chilled shot glass and serve alongside the martini.

drinks.name: Port Wine Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Planter’s Punch
drinks.instructions: Squeeze an orange and strain the juice. Put all the ingredients in a shaker filled with ice and shake for at least 12 seconds. Strain into a highball glass and decorate with a pineapple wedge or fruit of your choice.

drinks.name: Pysch Vitamin Light
drinks.instructions: Shake with ice.

drinks.name: The Galah
drinks.instructions: Mix together the alcoholic portions and top with Pineapple and Lime juice.

drinks.name: Tia-Maria
drinks.instructions: Boil water, sugar and coffe for 10 mins and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

drinks.name: Pink Panty Pulldowns
drinks.instructions: Shake well

drinks.name: Thriller
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Passion Fruit Martini
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir. Garnish with half a passion fruit piece.

drinks.name: Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie
drinks.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinks.name: Texas Sling
drinks.instructions: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

drinks.name: Tom Collins
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

drinks.name: Turkeyball
drinks.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Tipperary
drinks.instructions: Stir over ice. Strain into chilled glass. Cut a wide swath of orange peel, and express the orange oils over the drink. Discard orange twist.

drinks.name: Tomato Tang
drinks.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Tequila Fizz
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Tennesee Mud
drinks.instructions: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.

drinks.name: Tequila Sour
drinks.instructions: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Talos Coffee
drinks.instructions: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

drinks.name: Thai Iced Tea
drinks.instructions: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

drinks.name: Turf Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinks.name: The Last Word
drinks.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Tequila Slammer
drinks.instructions: Mix carefully to avoid releasing the dissolved CO2.

drinks.name: Tequila Sunrise
drinks.instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Tuxedo Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

drinks.name: The Philosopher
drinks.instructions: Add all the spirits in a shaker (best to use Hendricks gin) as well as the orange bitters and lemon juice. Strain into a Margarita glass, top with Prosecco.

drinks.name: Tequila Surprise
drinks.instructions: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.

drinks.name: The Jimmy Conway
drinks.instructions:
Fill glass with ice
Pour in The Irishman and Disaronno
Fill to the top with Cranberry Juice
Garnish with a slice of lemon…Enjoy!

drinks.name: Texas Rattlesnake
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end...

drinks.name: Victor
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Vesper
drinks.instructions: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Van Vleet
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinks.name: Vodka Fizz
drinks.instructions: Blend all ingredients, save nutmeg. Pour into large white wine glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Vesuvio
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinks.name: Veteran
drinks.instructions: Pour the rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Vodka Slime
drinks.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka, 7-up then finish with the lime juice.

drinks.name: Vermouth Cassis
drinks.instructions: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

drinks.name: Vodka Martini
drinks.instructions: Shake the vodka and vermouth together with a number of ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive and serve.

drinks.name: Vodka Russian
drinks.instructions: Mix it as a ordinary drink .

drinks.name: Vodka And Tonic
drinks.instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Victory Collins
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

drinks.name: Valencia Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Orange Crush
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients to tumbler-Pour as shot

drinks.name: Orange Oasis
drinks.instructions: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Orgasm
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Oreo Mudslide
drinks.instructions: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

drinks.name: Old Pal
drinks.instructions: Chill cocktail glass. Add ingredients to a mixing glass, and fill 2/3 full with ice. Stir about 20 seconds. Empty cocktail glass and strain into the glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Orange Whip
drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

drinks.name: Orangeade
drinks.instructions: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.instructions:
Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: Orange Rosemary Collins
drinks.instructions: Add the spirits to the bottom of the glass and top equally with the mixer drinks. Garnish with orange slices inside the glass as well as some rosemary on top.

drinks.name: Owen's Grandmother's Revenge
drinks.instructions: Add ingredients and mix in blender.

drinks.name: Quentin
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Oatmeal Cookie
drinks.instructions:
Just mix it all together.
It's meant to be a shot, but it works just fine as a proper adult-sized drink over lots of ice.

Tastes like an oatmeal cookie.

drinks.name: Orange Push-up
drinks.instructions: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

drinks.name: Queen Elizabeth
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Queen Charlotte
drinks.instructions: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Quaker's Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Quick F**K
drinks.instructions: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream

drinks.name: Quick-sand
drinks.instructions: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

drinks.name: Queen Bee
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
